Action - Enum in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj
This enum is for use with the player and keeps track of what they did on their last turn.

addItem(WorldItem, Random, Player) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj.Grid
Selects a random valid position on the grid and places a specified WorldItem there, also placing it in unoccupied rooms.

addTurnCount() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj.Engine
Adds one to Engine.turnCount at the end of every turn.
Agent - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj
This class represents an agent in the game (enemies and the player) and is the parent class for Player and Ninja.

This field represents the amount of ammo the Player has, which should never be greater than one.
